price: គេចង់បណេ្ដញពួកអ្នកចេញពីទឹកដីរបស់ពួកអ្នក។ (ហ្វៀរអោនបានសួរថា) ដូចេ្នះតើពួកអ្នកត្រូវឱ្យខ្ញុំធ្វើដូចម្តេច?
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum bisiḥ'rihi famādhā tamurūna
